game.path: ./Milk Inside a Bag of Milk inside a Bag of Milk.sh
game.name: Milk inside a bag of Milk inside a bag of Milk
game.desc: Milk inside a bag... is a small visual novel, showing either funny abstraction and wordplay or painful psychological episodes. The claim that history is based on real events will be too specific, so it is easier to pretend that it is just a set of abstractions and wordplay.
